verses.name: Psalms 118:1
verses.text: O give thanks unto the Lord; for he is good: because his mercy endureth for ever.

verses.name: Psalms 118:2
verses.text: Let Israel now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.

verses.name: Psalms 118:3
verses.text: Let the house of Aaron now say, that his mercy endureth for ever.

verses.name: Psalms 118:4
verses.text: Let them now that fear the Lord say, that his mercy endureth for ever.

verses.name: Psalms 118:5
verses.text: I called upon the Lord in distress: the Lord answered me, and set me in a large place.

verses.name: Psalms 118:6
verses.text: The Lord is on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me?

verses.name: Psalms 118:7
verses.text: The Lord taketh my part with them that help me: therefore shall I see my desire upon them that hate me.

verses.name: Psalms 118:8
verses.text: It is better to trust in the Lord than to put confidence in man.

verses.name: Psalms 118:9
verses.text: It is better to trust in the Lord than to put confidence in princes.

verses.name: Psalms 118:10
verses.text: All nations compassed me about: but in the name of the Lord will I destroy them.

verses.name: Psalms 118:11
verses.text: They compassed me about; yea, they compassed me about: but in the name of the Lord I will destroy them.

verses.name: Psalms 118:12
verses.text: They compassed me about like bees; they are quenched as the fire of thorns: for in the name of the Lord I will destroy them.

verses.name: Psalms 118:13
verses.text: Thou hast thrust sore at me that I might fall: but the Lord helped me.

verses.name: Psalms 118:14
verses.text: The Lord is my strength and song, and is become my salvation.

verses.name: Psalms 118:15
verses.text: The voice of rejoicing and salvation is in the tabernacles of the righteous: the right hand of the Lord doeth valiantly.

verses.name: Psalms 118:16
verses.text: The right hand of the Lord is exalted: the right hand of the Lord doeth valiantly.

verses.name: Psalms 118:17
verses.text: I shall not die, but live, and declare the works of the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 118:18
verses.text: The Lord hath chastened me sore: but he hath not given me over unto death.

verses.name: Psalms 118:19
verses.text: Open to me the gates of righteousness: I will go into them, and I will praise the Lord:

verses.name: Psalms 118:20
verses.text: This gate of the Lord, into which the righteous shall enter.

verses.name: Psalms 118:21
verses.text: I will praise thee: for thou hast heard me, and art become my salvation.

verses.name: Psalms 118:22
verses.text: The stone which the builders refused is become the head stone of the corner.

verses.name: Psalms 118:23
verses.text: This is the Lord’s doing; it is marvellous in our eyes.

verses.name: Psalms 118:24
verses.text: This is the day which the Lord hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.

verses.name: Psalms 118:25
verses.text: Save now, I beseech thee, O Lord: O Lord, I beseech thee, send now prosperity.

verses.name: Psalms 118:26
verses.text: Blessed be he that cometh in the name of the Lord: we have blessed you out of the house of the Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 118:27
verses.text: God is the Lord, which hath shewed us light: bind the sacrifice with cords, even unto the horns of the altar.

verses.name: Psalms 118:28
verses.text: Thou art my God, and I will praise thee: thou art my God, I will exalt thee.

verses.name: Psalms 118:29
verses.text: O give thanks unto the Lord; for he is good: for his mercy endureth for ever.
